body_html: Thank you @penpornk ! I have modified the location of Slice shape function. And I also remember that there is a test added in mkl_layout_pass test(tensorflow/core/graph/mkl_layout_pass_test.cc). Besides, there already exists some UT tests for Slice op.

body: Thank you @penpornk ! I have modified the location of Slice shape function. And I also remember that there is a test added in mkl_layout_pass test(tensorflow/core/graph/mkl_layout_pass_test.cc). Besides, there already exists some UT tests for Slice op.
